tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  report_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  regulatory_body VARCHAR(100),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT,
    body_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (body_id) REFERENCES regulatory_bodies(body_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SQLDataReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    body_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (body_id) REFERENCES RegulatoryBodies(body_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceVerification (
    verification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    approved BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    verification_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES SQLDataReports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AuditPurpose (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    verification_id INT,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    audit_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (verification_id) REFERENCES ComplianceVerification(verification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_bodies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  contact_person VARCHAR,
  contact_email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE sql_data_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  report_type VARCHAR,
  report_data VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_verification (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  verification_status VARCHAR,
  verification_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE audit_purposes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  auditor_name VARCHAR,
  audit_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_domain (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  domain_name VARCHAR,
  company_id INT,
  certification_status VARCHAR
)
